title: Anthropologie Typeface
content:
Hello!

I was wondering if anyone would happen to know what typeface is used in the attached scan of a sales policy piece I found at the Antropologie store. It is a distressed typewriter typeface.

Thank you!

justin :)

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [anthropologie.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010915/http:/typophile.com/files/anthropologie.jpg) | 46.07 KB |
| [anthropologie2.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20141226010915/http:/typophile.com/files/anthropologie2.jpg) | 53.75 KB |
author: jclapp

comments.content: Yikes. How'd you get that "fontmagazine.com" URL, Charles? I think that's a fluke.

@ Stephen,

I agree it's weird... not a come across it before, I simply Googled 'Trixie' to check it was the font I was thinking of and it came up with that link.

Strange huh?
